arts.ttl: I laughed at Arsenal's double standards after Martin Keown took aim at Newcastle
arts.sum: David Raya took his time with his goal kicks and was one of a number of Arsenal players who required treatment, even going down at one point midway through the second half, which allowed the Gunners to have a drinks break and a team talk. However, Martin Keown, unsurprisingly, stood up for his former side and praised Arsenal's 'game management' after revealing he 'cannot stand the term dark arts'.

arts.ttl: Newcastle on verge of agreeing record deal with super winger
arts.sum: After five games of the Premier League season, Newcastle sit poised nicely in sixth place and just three points behind leaders, Man City. Importantly, all five teams above them have European competition to attend to this season, whilst the Magpies midweek’s are mostly free. That may not show itself as a benefit at this early […] The post Newcastle on verge of agreeing record deal with super winger appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United on transfer alert as summer target asking price set to plummet
arts.sum: Newcastle United summer target Dominic Calvert-Lewin could be set for a cut-price January transfer move after reports suggesting new contract talks had stalled. Reports this week from transfer guru Fabrizio Romano claim that talks with Calvert-Lewin and Everton are yet to progress, with discussions planned for later in the year.

arts.ttl: Man United and Newcastle eyeing up a move for €20m-rated midfield prodigy
arts.sum: Manchester United and Newcastle United have been linked with a move for the Barcelona midfielder Marc Bernal. According to Spanish journalist Moises Llorens, the two English clubs are keeping tabs on the 17-year-old Barcelona prospect and it remains to be seen whether they decide to make a move for him in the near future. His […] The post Man United and Newcastle eyeing up a move for €20m-rated midfield prodigy appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United help out £50,000 fundraiser to fix AFC Wimbledon pitch
arts.sum: Graham Stacey set up the fundraiser to help repair the club after it appeared to have a sinkhole in the pitch

arts.ttl: Newcastle United hand Wimbledon £15,000 in classy gesture after ground damage
arts.sum: Newcastle United have handed Wimbledon £15,000 towards repairing Plough Lane after flooding damage. "It has been an immensely difficult day for club staff given the extent of the flooding, with related damage to our pitch and stadium.

arts.ttl: Gary Neville attacks Premier League after threat of barring Newcastle United from Europe
arts.sum: Labour has dismissed rumours that English teams such as Newcastle United and Neville's former club Manchester United could be excluded from European tournaments with the advent of a new regulator, despite UEFA's policy against state interference in football governance, emphasising its independence. Gary Neville has taken a swipe at the Premier League, accusing them of acting like bullies in the face of a potential independent football regulator.

arts.ttl: Gary Neville attacks Premier League after threat of barring Newcastle United from Europe

arts.ttl: Newcastle United to release retro Adidas gear that will sell 'like hot cakes' this week
arts.sum: He said then: "Growing up everybody is probably aware of the game-changing products and kits that Adidas designed for Newcastle United in the 1990s. Modelled by rap and grime MC and Brit award winner Casisdead, the shirt is accompanied by a retro style tracksuit and a hoodie that already have fans eager to get their hands on the new gear.

arts.ttl: AFC Wimbledon fan campaign raises more than £50k after huge Newcastle donation
arts.sum: AFC Wimbledon fans and the wider football community have been contributing to fundraiser after the League Two club's Plough Lane stadium was significantly affected by flooding
